message:
Determine which eyebrow [nid2] is more dominant. Before beginning your training, you will [nid1] want to figure out which eyebrow will be most easily trained. Typically, this will be your dominant eyebrow. Stand in front of a mirror, and try to lift [nid3] your right eyebrow. Then try to lift only your left eyebrow.

Legend (keep these identifiers intact):
[nid0] marks 'eyebrow.'
[nid1] marks 'will'
[nid2] marks 'eyebrow'
[nid3] marks 'lift'
[nid4] marks 'dominant.'
